text:
* Growth Hacker/Demand Gen Marketing | San Francisco, CA | Full-Time | On-Site *

ZenProspect, the first unified sales enablement platform is looking to invite an incredibly talented growth marketer to the the team. Someone with considerable experience with demand generation and full-stack marketing skills (SEO/Content/etc), and who wants to join a high-flying, profitable, SaaS sales company.

Here are our current job openings (Growth Marketing, SDR, Account Executive, Customer Success Manager):

https://jobs.lever.co/zenprospect
